articles.author: Meeri Kim
articles.title: Allergies seem nearly impossible to avoid — unless you’re Amish - The Washington Post
articles.description: One Amish community living in northern Indiana is considered one of the least allergic populations ever measured in the developed world.
articles.content:
Whether triggered by pollen, pet dander or peanuts, allergies in this day and age seem nearly impossible to avoid. But one group appears virtually immune, a mystery to experts who study allergies.
